attributes.action: give rights to babies born under the viable gestation period i.e: under 24 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, by law a baby born under 24 weeks, is classed as non viable due to the abortion laws. My aim is to Consider all babies born sleeping and also the ones alive under the 24 week gestation period to be treated and helped, the same as a baby born full term. Making the two laws two seperate issues and giving parents the choice as to whether they would like their childs birth/death reconised with a certificate and memorabillia. To also consider the after care that a mother/baby recieves once delivered. And too create a sleeping angels official reister
